{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = ASUS USB-AC53 Nano.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Dual-band Wireless-AC1200 USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = http://www.asus.com/Networking/USB-AC53-Nano |sp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/USB-AC53-Nano/HelpDesk/ |dl = https://www.asus.com/Networking/USB-AC53-Nano/HelpDesk_Download/ |wikidevi = ASUS_USB-AC53_Nano |wikipedia = |brand = ASUS |model = USB-AC53 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Nano |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 01/03/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_USB-AC53_Nano |sernum = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = nano dongle |vendor_id = 0b05 |device_id = 184c |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = MSQ-USBACRN00, NDD9578221607 |icid = 3568A-USBACRN00 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 04:92:26, BC:AE:C5 |chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812BU; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = EW-7822UNC |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = MU-MIMO |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/29/2016 |estreldate = |price = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = 0XM-005U-00042 |asin = B071KV2SMV |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== * "EW-7822UNC" and "P/C=F119-223" is silkscreened on the board (top). * "1246-00000172-50Z" and "1637" is silkscreened on the board (bottom). {{see also|ASUS|Edimax|Edimax EW-7822UNC}} A thernal pad is attached to the RTL8812BU IC to conduct heat into the USB connector. ==Pictures==
'''User Images''' File:ASUS_USB-AC53_Nano_board_top.jpg|board top File:ASUS_USB-AC53_Nano_board_bot.jpg|board bottom
[[Has images::internal| ]] ==Notes== ===Linux support=== *[https://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2362577 ''Driver for Asus USB-AC53 Nano'' on '''UbuntuForums'''] *[https://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=2362669 ''Driver for Asus USB-AC53 Nano'' on '''UbuntuForums'''] :Driver '''rtl8822bu''' on [[Edimax EW-7822ULC]]: [http://www.edimax.com/edimax/mw/cufiles/files/download/Driver_Utility/EW-7822ULC_Linux_Driver_1.0.0.9.zip ''Download''] 
 Bus 001 Device 003: ID 0b05:184c ASUSTek Computer, Inc.
 usb 1-1.2: new high-speed USB device number 4 using dwc_otg
 usb 1-1.2: New USB device found, idVendor=0b05, idProduct=184c
 usb 1-1.2: New USB device strings: Mfr=1, Product=2, SerialNumber=3
 usb 1-1.2: Product: 802.11ac NIC
 usb 1-1.2: Manufacturer: Realtek
 usb 1-1.2: SerialNumber: 123456
*[https://github.com/jeremyb31/rtl8822bu/blob/2bca1c86ac0aded009a0d9307abe0afd622f7c69/os_dep/linux/usb_intf.c '''jeremyb31/rtl8822bu'''] ([https://github.com/jeremyb31/rtl8822bu/commit/2bca1c86ac0aded009a0d9307abe0afd622f7c69 commit]) :For linux kernel version > 4.14 jeremyb31's driver will not work so far, :but with the changes from [https://github.com/y0urself/rtl8822bu'''y0urself/rtl8822bu'''] you will be fine! *[https://github.com/MeissnerEffect/rtl8822bu '''MeissnerEffect/rtl8822bu'''] :For linux kernel version > 4.15 (init_timer deprecation) check. None of the above worked for me, but this one did: https://github.com/cilynx/rtl88x2bu :For linux kernel version 2.6.24 ~ 5.8 (Realtek), 5.9 (Nov,2020) Easy to follow installation: https://github.com/morrownr/88x2bu This made my usb-ac53 show up in network(Kubuntu 20.10), but remember to go to network setting and change it to wpa2. It will keep falling to connect to router, which support wpa3. The adapter itself on the other hand is not wpa3 supported. ==See also== [http://www.asus.com/Networking/Wireless-Adapters-Products/ Asus Wireless Adapters Products] *[[ASUS USB-AC68]] - Dual-Band AC1900 USB Wi-Fi Adapter *[[ASUS USB-AC56]] - Dual-Band AC1300 USB 3.0 Wi-Fi Adapter *[[ASUS USB-AC56R]] - Dual-Band AC1300 USB 3.0 Wi-Fi Adapter *[[ASUS USB-AC55 B1]] - Dual-Band AC1300 USB 3.0 Wi-Fi Adapter *[[ASUS USB-AC55]] - Dual-Band AC1300 USB 3.0 Wi-Fi Adapter *[[ASUS USB-AC54]] - Dual-Band AC1300 USB 3.0 Wi-Fi Adapter *[[ASUS USB-AC53]] - Dual-Band AC1200 USB Wi-Fi Adapter *[[ASUS USB-AC51]] - Dual-Band AC600 USB Wi-Fi Adapter *[[ASUS USB-AC50]] - 5GHz Wireless AC450 USB Wi-Fi Adapter [[Category:English Documentation]]
